message: This is a high-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $100. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great deal. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'll take your word for it and buy the product, since you say it's high-quality and I have no reason to doubt you yet.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! As for this next product, I want to be transparent with you. I've had some... variations in quality in my recent shipments. I'm not sure if this one meets my usual standards. It's a risk, but I'm willing to let you try it for $100. If you're not satisfied, we can discuss a return, but I'm confident you'll find it's still a great value.
I appreciate your honesty, but since you're unsure about the quality and there's a higher chance of it being low-quality, I'll have to pass on this one.
